title: 11/15/23: Automatic recording of schedules
content: Emprez has added an option that you can enable at your convenience to save your schedules automatically without having to click Save.With this option, no more forgetting, no more additional clicking.To activate this option, click on your Name at the top right,Then, next to the Dashboard button, click on the Others button,Check the box Auto-Save Schedules,Click Validate.That's it ! Your schedules will be saved automatically when you schedule.However, please note that for your employees to see their schedules you will need to click on the Publish button as usual.Helpful?10Updated: 1 year ago Share :
